Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: mcmack3
Reviews.Content: Recently we made a last minute decision to join friends at Ocean City. Three weeks prior to our arrival all the hotels I checked had no vacancy until I found Edan roc. I felt lucky they had availability. Now I know why. To begin with I thought it unusual I had to send a check for one day to hold our reservation. When we arrived we had to pay for the remaining 3 days up front.Again unusual. We went to our room. the porch was 12 inches wide with a broken chair. Red flag. In the room 2 beds. Sqeaky and soft, no blankets, no tissues, no hair dryer, no iron, towels were small, thin and like sand paper and no coffee pot,no clock.Paying for ice was the kicker. Noticed all the hotels in the area had no vacancy signs except Edan Roc. What a surprise. I thought it was over priced for what they offered. the only positive was that it was close to the boardwalk and beach. Parking was at a premium.

Reviews.Title: “Great Rates and Location”
Reviews.Author: Jon - Patricia K
Reviews.Content: Great price for the location. We stayed in the Motel part which is right behind the boardwalk. There is also efficency apartments on the boardwalk. Check in was smooth. Staff, for the most part kept to themselves, unless you had a question or request. We asked for pillows and got them right away. The room was very clean. The pool was very nice and clean. Our room was poolside and I saw the staff cleaning and vacuming the pool every night. There was some comotion from another room and the staff, with the police resolved quickly. (However, we didn't mind too much. Free entertainment.) I think the only thing we didn't like was that you had to pay for the use of the ice machine. This is definately not an upscale motel, but your not paying for one. I'm sure we will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “love the employees”
Reviews.Author: Sharanda T
Reviews.Content: nice place to stay,.. worth the rates...and they are cheap!!!

Reviews.Title: “wow...never again!”
Reviews.Author: richard m
Reviews.Content: Start off by saying, when we got into the room. The shower curtain had mold, water was dripping in tub, dirt, all over the floor. The beds were hard as a rock(spring coming through mattress) we asked for more towels, took them forever to get them. this was by the worst place i have decided to stay.!!! next year i will spend 300+ for a room!! disgusting place to stay. the only thing was missing was bed bugs, then you would have had ever nasty thing possible! to top it all off....everyone is sick since we came home. maybe mold infested bathroom? NEVER AGAIN!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good stay, clean, affordable”
Reviews.Author: Russ E
Reviews.Content: At first we were skeptical about staying here because for June it was a cheap place. Most other places wanted over 200$ a night while the Eden Roc was low $100. So we went in with a mind of this place may be outdated, dirty, and small. Turned out it was not as bad as imagined. Beds were nice and clean. We checked both for bedbugs upon arrival and any unusual critters. It is not the biggest room but adequate size. The floors are tiled so sand from the beach makes it way into room and if you walk on floors barefoot you will accumulate sand. All in all good stay and will stay again. 1 room was in the process of being completely renovated when we arrived and by the looks of it they were doing some good work.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, great location...but let's face it, it's dumpy.”
Reviews.Author: PeggyD1959
Reviews.Content: We are two adult sisters and their mom, and we go to Ocean City every fall for a few days. We like to stay on the Boardwalk for the convenience (and because it isn't crowded after Labor Day). Last year we were at a nicer hotel, but the price...let's just say, we were looking to save some money and have more to spend on steamed crabs! So we gave the Eden Roc a try. The room was large, but the space is odd---it's a long, narrow room with two beds and a sofa-sleeper against one wall. Bathroom was clean, kitchen was clean, liked the full size fridge. The decor and bed linens are best described as "tired." Everything was clean, it just felt dumpy. The balcony is not private, but we were there in off-season, so had it to ourselves anyway--but that might be an issue for some. We loved being on the boardwalk, steps away from the beach. This place had the best price by far for an ocean-front efficiency on the boardwalk, but I think we'll spend the extra money and go back to the nicer hotel next year. Bottom line is, we aren't as budget-conscious as we thought. But for people looking for a great price and a great location, this place might be perfect.

Reviews.Title: “GOOD FOR THE MONEY”
Reviews.Author: chris c
Reviews.Content: i Have stayed here twice. Once in 2008 with wife and new born and once in sep 2010 with just the wife. Good experience both times. Barely used the room but too sleep. spent all day on beach or at shops. Clean and private pool. Staff had good manners. cleaned room daily. its not the hilton but at theese prices its a great stay!! coming back again august 24 through sep 1st with the wife and both the kids. Making it a family tradition.. oh yeah great location also... steps from the boarwalk. Love it love it love it!

Reviews.Title: “OK, but will look some where else.”
Reviews.Author: cole24
Reviews.Content: First time at Eden Roc, we always stay next door, but this trip was a last minute idea and the other motel was booked that we always stay at. Room was clean when going in, they have tile flooring, not carpet..so wore socks the whole time while we were there. They never must of swept the floors, sand and what ever you may have dropped would still be there. So, I actually had an old bed sheet that I was going to use for the beach, but laid it out on the floor, because they never cleaned it. Bathroom was a nice size small towels, then was ready for bed and lifted the comforter and had a brown bug in it and it was alive...no!! it wasn't a bed bug, but still a bug is a bug!! So, the kind of person I am I had a hard time sleeping..which I'm sure every person would after that. And of course did a whole sweep of the bed. We were on the back side, the steps going up were very old and steep, so don't stay on the back side, stay closer to the pool. The pool was nice, the place seemed to have a lot of noise compared to the motel that was "right next door" which was weird, you would like it would be the same, but it wasn't. Well, on our last day, as always I do a double, triple look to make sure we got everything and looked on my husband's side of the bed..my son and I slept on the other bed while we were there, so anyway, when I lifted the pillow (hotels) pillow there was a dead maggot under the pillow!! I was like OMG..So, I haven't actually told him yet!! LOL..So, who knows now what was around after I saw that...I'm glad that we brought our own pillows as I do what ever hotel we stay at.

Reviews.Title: “It could've been worse!”
Reviews.Author: Shawny74
Reviews.Content: We arrived around 11 and check-in was not until 2 but our rooms were ready and they allowed us to check-in early. The rooms were fairly clean we killed a spider and that was the only one we saw. There were no other bugs or bed bugs that bothered us. The lampshades and pillows were stained but I always bring my own pillows. The hotel employees were very helpful for anything we needed. The parking was a little scarce but if nothing at the hotel was available they gave us a parking pass to park in the parking garage right next door. They rent bikes for the boardwalk in the morning. My only real complaint would be about the pool. The kids were very unruly. There are a list of rules on the pool gate and I think not a person was obeying. They had glass bottles, floating devices and balls which none were allowed. The kids chased each other and ran around until one fell and hit his head on the concrete. Not one employee came in and said a word to any of these kids. Sure they were having fun and I have kids of my own but for some of the older foks staying there it was an inconvience for them. But overall it was cheap and not to shabby and a half a block from the beach and boardwalk. We would definately stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and clean”
Reviews.Author: Albert2010
Reviews.Content: I stay here for years it very nice. the staff is very friendly. I don't know why people wrote that this places has bed bugs it not for everybody.it has cheap rates and they have gas grill that the guest can use I had a wonderful time stay here. I would stay here again. It also is a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Four of the people in our group came home with bed bug bites all over their bodies.”
Reviews.Author: ownwbj
Reviews.Content: Low budget motel, good location, but dirty and not worth being attacked by bed bugs. Limited parking; had to drive around for 30 minutes to find a parking spot on arrival.

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: graphicd92
Reviews.Content: I really didnt think that it would be too bad to stay in this place, i was a little raggedy looking but i could see past that, what i couldn't get over is how damaged and rundown the rooms were and how rude the management is. It even brought my girlfriend to tears on how mean their staff is. We had to complain twice because the cleaning ladies didn't touch our room and when we confronted the office about it they yelled and blamed it on us. i would never stay at this motel again no matter how good the cost is!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not the best”
Reviews.Author: lovetrvl08
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 4 nights in this motel for our one year wedding anniversary. I stayed here with my family years ago and at that time it wasn't that bad. I knew it wasn't going to be an extravagent motel but I did have a few expectations. A few things that were terrible: the bed was way small and uncomfortable, the bedding was old, I thought there would have been a small table with the chairs and there wasn't. We had no remote in the room at first so they had to bring one in. We arrived late around 9 our first night and there was one towel in the room so we had to go down and ask for more, then wait for someone to bring them up. You would think there would have been 2 sets of towels. And the last thing I hated were the tile floors, we put the hand towels on the floor to wipe the sand off before getting into bed, oh and the room was small than I expected. My husndand and I are both in agreement that we will pay more money for a nice place to stay next time because it will definitley bee worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Was budget friendly”
Reviews.Author: Gouldieloc
Reviews.Content: Last summer we decided to go to OC for vacation and found the Roc while driving around comparing outrageous prices for hotels. This place is not fancy by any means, but if you are looking for a clean place to lay your head down at night for a price that is very reasonable - then this is your place! We loved the tile floors - no smelly , gross , dirty carpet. The staff was more than happy to accomodate us with a broom and dust pan to sweep any sand that we had tracked in. House keeping did a fine job - clean towels , empty trash cans , cleaning the bathroom and etc. The rates on the room at the Roc actually afforded us two more nights in OC. We have booked ourselves there this year as well. As far as parking went, there is a 5 or 6 floor parking garage directly beside the hotel, so I am not sure how parking could be an issue unless you are just too lazy to walk around the corner to get into an elevator. The pool is small, but there were plenty of lounge chairs for everyone in our group at all times.

Reviews.Title: “Cheesy Motel that suits the purpose”
Reviews.Author: vduggan1
Reviews.Content: If you are use to staying in cheesy looking motels or you are very low on cash, then this will do you just fine. I stayed in the motel portion, not the efficiencies. I went twice while in college. The first time I went with 2 college friends and though it looked cheesy on the outside, the room itself was ok (motel style). The worst part of the stay was our room window facing construction and having that as our wake up call every morning. I went back again while in college, b/c as most people know when you don't have a lot of money, you have to take what you can get. I went with my boyfriend this time. Our room was significantly smaller (like half the size), similar to a closet, but b/c we were young and in love, we stayed at the beach and only came in to sleep. Overall, a college student with not a lot of money or on spring break or something of that nature would have no problem with it. Being that I am now 7 years older and I actually have a little money, you wont see me at the Eden Roc, but it served its purpose. FYI - I did just go to OC a couple of weeks ago (staying in a different hotel) and the outside of the Eden Roc looks EXACTLY the same. Hopefully in 6-7 years since I have been in the inside, they have spruced it up.

Reviews.Title: “Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: jerrypa61
Reviews.Content: I take my mom to Eden Roc just about every year. We stay in the top floor effeciencies facing the ocean. She LOVES it there. It's close to everything, she drinks her morning coffee on the balcony facing the ocean, and the staff has been great (except some jerky guy in the office). It's not the Ritz, but it's very comfortable for middle class folks. The only negatives were that one year we had ants when we got there. The staff sprayed and that took care of it. One year we were moved to a different room then the one we reserved because some college kids had spilled beer all over the floor - not the hotels fault. But they gave us another effeciency facing the ocean on the same floor. No problem. We have been very pleased and are going back again this year. She always tells me she wants to stay at Eden Roc. I totally recommend it to you.

Reviews.Title: “Eden Roc 7-07”
Reviews.Author: ronnieinpa
Reviews.Content: My experience was just okay. My biggest problem with this motel was the newer tile floors that have been installed throughout the room. It just felt odd to me to get out of bed and put your feet down on tile. Also, unlike carpet, the floors stayed gritty and wet. I got weary of brushing my feet off before I crawled into bed each night. Just an uncomfortble feeling all week. The maid service cleaned very average. None of our luggage was ever moved to vacumn or sweep under, so we always seemed to have sand. The pool was small but alright. Parking was extremely tight. I was warned about that issue. Would I ever stay here again? Nah. It wasn't my worst motel experience, but I will spend a little more money next time I visit OC.

Reviews.Title: “senior week”
Reviews.Author: shoutitout
Reviews.Content: took all of our money even security deposit due to the fact everyone was to meet at our motel so we can go to a basketball tourament there was 17 of us this happened at 4:30 in the afternoon. they told us no guest was alloud.

HotelInfo.Name: Eden Roc Motel
HotelInfo.Address: Oceanfront on 20th Street, Ocean City, MD 21842
